query:
SELECT
                id as "id!",
                block_height as "block_height!",
                timestamp,
                entry_type as "entry_type!: AccountStatementEntryType",
                amount as "amount!"
            FROM (
                SELECT
                    id,
                    block_height,
                    blocks.slot_time as "timestamp",
                    entry_type,
                    amount
                FROM account_statements
                JOIN
                    blocks
                ON
                    blocks.height = account_statements.block_height
                WHERE
                    entry_type IN (
                        'FinalizationReward',
                        'FoundationReward',
                        'BakerReward',
                        'TransactionFeeReward'
                    )
                    AND account_index = $5
                    AND id > $2
                    AND id < $1
                ORDER BY
                    (CASE WHEN $4 THEN id END) ASC,
                    (CASE WHEN NOT $4 THEN id END) DESC
                LIMIT $3
            )
            ORDER BY
                id DESC
